show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: A New Take On The ‘Cult’ Of Optimism

title: A New Take On The ‘Cult’ Of Optimism
content:
The truth behind the ugly Ukrainian situation, instigated, as usual, by the United States. <!--more--> A short history of the country and some perspective on the reality behind the elections in Crimea.
Not what you will hear from the main-stream media.
All of which goes to show how very dangerous America is to world peace.
Existing home sales are showing pronounced weakness, giving the lie to the idea that there is an ongoing recovery in the housing market.
More evidence that the American middle class is shrinking.
Optimism and resilience.
The ability to endure hardships and setbacks has been analysed and leads to some interesting conclusions.
You may discover some new ways of seeing and thinking about the world.
(Don’t forget the Meet-Up Group on Sunday!)
